name: Evolve or Die (FrancoRaineri3d)
description:
Plot

The cyan, magenta and yellow civilizations have lived apart from each other for thousands of years. However, a new threat threatens the extinction of the three peoples. Additives, sworn enemies of the three civilizations, have evolved. The only way to stop them is to mix the three civilizations, resulting in an evolution of the species.

 

 How to Play

Your goal is to protect the towers of the three civilizations from Additives.

- Use the number keys 1, 2, 3 to spawn an citizen of the Cyan, Magenta or Yellow tribe respectively

- Use left mouse button + drag to move a citizen

- Use the right mouse button + drag to move the camera

- To create an advanced citizen drag one basic citizen onto another and release the mouse

- To stop an enemy, create an evolved citizen of the same color as the enemy and drag it onto it

(Es: If the color of the enemy is red, you need to combine a Magenta citizen with a Yellow citizen)

Credits

3d art & Scripting: Franco Raineri

Music: Siddhartha Corsus - The Fountain of Living Waters

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com“
